com.psddev.dari.util

Interface ConversionFunction<F,T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ObjectToAnyCollection, ObjectToAnyMap, ObjectToConstant, ObjectToIterable

    public interface ConversionFunction<F,T>
    Function for converting an arbitrary object into an instance of another type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T convert(Converter converter, Type returnType, F object)
      Converts the given object into an instance of the given returnType.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        T convert(Converter converter,
        Type returnType,
        F object)
          throws Exception
        Converts the given object into an instance of the given returnType.
        Parameters:
        converter - For when this method needs to convert other values.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the given returnType or object is null.
